price: 55. Les hôtes du Paradis seront, ce jour-là, tout occupés à jouir de leur félicité.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
